New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers set a new franchise record with 10 consecutive double-digit wins.
Key Match Events: Darius Garland and LaMelo Ball engaged in a spirited duel on the court
Jarrett Allen quietly dominated the paint with a 15-point first half on 7-of-7 shooting and eight rebounds
Charlotte managed just 19 assists as a team
Pre-Game Insights: The matchup had an unspoken edge, sparked by the first fan returns for All-Star voting
Ball topped Eastern Conference guards, Donovan Mitchell followed in second, and Garland was left outside the top 10 in All-Star voting
Post-Match Reflections: Cavaliers coach Kenny Atkinson praised his team's maturity and focus
Max Strus emphasized the team's championship mindset
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland's offense flowed seamlessly, with crisp ball movement and unselfishness resulting in assists on 29 of their 44 made baskets
The Cavs showcased their depth and balance, with five players scoring 15 or more points
